resources.string: Thanks for using Screen Off. Before Screen Off can help you to lock the screen, it requires the activiting of your Lock the screen function. Please select ACTIVATE to proceed. On the function activated, the screen will be off. To uninstall Screen Off, long press the Screen Off to bring up app shortcut, select UNINSTALL and follow the prompt.
Thanks for using ScreenOff. To uninstall, press the uninstall button.
